instructions: Open the Settings app. Tap Touch ID & Passcode (or Face ID & Passcode on iPhone X or newer devices). If you registered a passcode, enter it to open the Settings screen. Tap Turn Passcode On . Enter a 6-digit passcode. Choose something you can easily remember. Confirm the passcode by entering the same passcode again. You may also be asked to log into your Apple ID . If so, enter your Apple ID password and tap Continue .
